verses.verse: וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came כְּכַלּ֣וֹת <WH3615> had finished שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> And it came to pass when Solomon לִבְנ֥וֹת <WH1129> the building אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king's וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all חֵ֣שֶׁק <WH2837> desire שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> and all Solomon's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חָפֵ֖ץ <WH2654> which he was pleased לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> to do פ

וַיֵּרָ֧א <WH7200> appeared יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> That the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> to Solomon שֵׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> the second time כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> he נִרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> as he had appeared אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him בְּגִבְעֽוֹן׃ <WH1391> unto him at Gibeon

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him שָׁ֠מַעְתִּי <WH8085> unto him I have heard אֶת־ <WH853> תְּפִלָּתְךָ֣ <WH8605> thy prayer וְאֶת־ <WH853> תְּחִנָּתְךָ֮ <WH8467> and thy supplication אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִתְחַנַּ֣נְתָּה <WH2603> that thou hast made לְפָנַי֒ <WH6440> before הִקְדַּ֗שְׁתִּי <WH6942> me I have hallowed אֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בָּנִ֔תָה <WH1129> which thou hast built לָשֽׂוּם־ <WH7760> to put שְׁמִ֥י <WH8034> my name שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there עַד־ <WH5704> there for עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> ever וְהָי֨וּ <WH1961> become עֵינַ֧י <WH5869> and mine eyes וְלִבִּ֛י <WH3820> and mine heart שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> will be there כָּל־ <WH3605> shall be there הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> shall be there perpetually

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you אִם־ <WH518> if תֵּלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> walked לְפָנַ֗י <WH6440> before כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after הָלַ֜ךְ <WH1980> walked דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> me as David אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> thy father בְּתָם־ <WH8537> in integrity לֵבָ֣ב <WH3824> of heart וּבְיֹ֔שֶׁר <WH3476> and in uprightness לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <WH6213> to do כְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> i צִוִּיתִ֑יךָ <WH6680> according to all that I have commanded חֻקַּ֥י <WH2706> my statutes וּמִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> and my judgments תִּשְׁמֹֽר׃ <WH8104> thee [and] wilt keep

וַהֲקִ֨מֹתִ֜י <WH6965> Then I will establish אֶת־ <WH853> כִּסֵּ֧א <WH3678> the throne מַֽמְלַכְתְּךָ֛ <WH4467> of thy kingdom עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> upon Israel לְעֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> I דִּבַּ֗רְתִּי <WH1696> as I promised עַל־ <WH5921> over דָּוִ֤ד <WH1732> to David אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> thy father לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יִכָּרֵ֤ת <WH3772> There shall not fail לְךָ֙ אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> thee a man מֵעַ֖ל <WH5921> over כִּסֵּ֥א <WH3678> upon the throne יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

אִם־ <WH518> if שׁ֨וֹב <WH7725> [But] if ye shall at all תְּשֻׁב֜וּן <WH7725> turn אַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> you וּבְנֵיכֶם֙ <WH1121> me ye or your children מֵֽאַחֲרַ֔י <WH310> from following וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not תִשְׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> and will not keep מִצְוֹתַ֣י <WH4687> my commandments חֻקֹּתַ֔י <WH2708> [and] my statutes אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַ֖תִּי <WH5414> which I have set לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> before וַהֲלַכְתֶּ֗ם <WH1980> you but go וַעֲבַדְתֶּם֙ <WH5647> and serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other וְהִשְׁתַּחֲוִיתֶ֖ם <WH7812> and worship לָהֶֽם׃

וְהִכְרַתִּ֣י <WH3772> Then will I cut off אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Israel מֵעַ֨ל <WH5921> of פְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> out הָאֲדָמָה֙ <WH127> of the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> which I have given לָהֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> them and this house אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הִקְדַּ֣שְׁתִּי <WH6942> which I have hallowed לִשְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> for my name אֲשַׁלַּ֖ח <WH7971> will I cast out מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> of פָּנָ֑י <WH6440> of my sight וְהָיָ֧ה <WH1961> will become יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> and Israel לְמָשָׁ֥ל <WH4912> shall be a proverb וְלִשְׁנִינָ֖ה <WH8148> and a byword בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> among all people

וְהַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> And at this house הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> and this יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will become עֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> [which] is high כָּל־ <WH3605> everyone עֹבֵ֥ר <WH5674> every one that passeth עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> by יִשֹּׁ֣ם <WH8074> by it shall be astonished וְשָׁרָ֑ק <WH8319> and shall hiss וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> and they shall say עַל־ <WH5921> and מֶ֨ה <WH4100> how long עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> done יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Why hath the LORD כָּ֔כָה <WH3602> thus לָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> thus unto this land הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise וְלַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> house הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וְאָמְר֗וּ <WH559> And they shall answer עַל֩ <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who עָזְב֜וּ <WH5800> Because they forsook אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֗ם <WH430> their God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> who brought forth אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבֹתָם֮ <WH1> their fathers מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> of Egypt וַֽיַּחֲזִ֙קוּ֙ <WH2388> and have taken hold בֵּאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> upon other [וַיִּשְׁתַּחוּ כ] (וַיִּשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ <WH7812> bow down ק) לָהֶ֖ם וַיַּעַבְדֻ֑ם <WH5647> them and served עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that הֵבִ֤יא <WH935> brought יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> them therefore hath the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and אֵ֥ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> upon them all this evil הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came מִקְצֵה֙ <WH7097> And it came to pass at the end עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> of twenty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בָּנָ֥ה <WH1129> had built שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> when Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> the two הַבָּתִּ֑ים <WH1004> houses אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> and the king's

חִירָ֣ם <WH2438> ([Now] Hiram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king צֹ֠ר <WH6865> of Tyre נִשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> had furnished אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלֹמֹ֜ה <WH8010> Solomon בַּעֲצֵי֩ <WH6086> trees אֲרָזִ֨ים <WH730> with cedar וּבַעֲצֵ֧י <WH6086> trees בְרוֹשִׁ֛ים <WH1265> and fir וּבַזָּהָ֖ב <WH2091> and with gold לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all חֶפְצ֑וֹ <WH2656> acceptable אָ֡ז <WH227> for יִתֵּן֩ <WH5414> gave הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> king שְׁלֹמֹ֤ה <WH8010> Solomon לְחִירָם֙ <WH2438> Hiram עֶשְׂרִ֣ים <WH6242> twenty עִ֔יר <WH5892> cities בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land הַגָּלִֽיל׃ <WH1551> of Galilee

וַיֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> came out חִירָם֙ <WH2438> And Hiram מִצֹּ֔ר <WH6865> from Tyre לִרְאוֹת֙ <WH7200> to see אֶת־ <WH853> הֶ֣עָרִ֔ים <WH5892> the cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נָתַן־ <WH5414> had given ל֖וֹ שְׁלֹמֹ֑ה <WH8010> which Solomon וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not יָשְׁר֖וּ <WH3474> direct בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> affliction

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said מָ֚ה <WH4100> What הֶעָרִ֣ים <WH5892> What cities הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> are these אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֥תָּה <WH5414> [are] these which thou hast given לִּ֖י אָחִ֑י <WH251> another וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> bewray לָהֶם֙ אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> them the land כָּב֔וּל <WH3521> of Cabul עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this פ
וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> sent חִירָ֖ם <WH2438> And Hiram לַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> twenty כִּכַּ֥ר <WH3603> talents זָהָֽב׃ <WH2091> of gold

וְזֶ֨ה <WH2088> now this דְבַר־ <WH1697> And this [is] the reason הַמַּ֜ס <WH4522> of the levy אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> which הֶעֱלָ֣ה ׀ <WH5927> raised הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> which king שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> Solomon לִבְנוֹת֩ <WH1129> for to build אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֨ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּיתוֹ֙ <WH1004> and his own house וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּלּ֔וֹא <WH4407> and Millo וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> חוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> and the wall יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <WH853> חָצֹ֥ר <WH2674> and Hazor וְאֶת־ <WH853> מְגִדּ֖וֹ <WH4023> and Megiddo וְאֶת־ <WH853> גָּֽזֶר׃ <WH1507> and Gezer

פַּרְעֹ֨ה <WH6547> [For] Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֜יִם <WH4714> of Egypt עָלָ֗ה <WH5927> had gone up וַיִּלְכֹּ֤ד <WH3920> and taken אֶת־ <WH853> גֶּ֙זֶר֙ <WH1507> Gezer וַיִּשְׂרְפָ֣הּ <WH8313> and burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> it with fire וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י <WH3669> the Canaanites הַיֹּשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> that dwelt בָּעִ֖יר <WH5892> in the city הָרָ֑ג <WH2026> and slain וַֽיִּתְּנָהּ֙ <WH5414> and given שִׁלֻּחִ֔ים <WH7964> it [for] a present לְבִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> unto his daughter אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife שְׁלֹמֹֽה׃ <WH8010> Solomon's
וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> built שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> And Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> גָּ֔זֶר <WH1507> Gezer וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית חֹרֹ֖ן <WH1032> and Bethhoron תַּחְתּֽוֹן׃ <WH8481> the nether
וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> בַּעֲלָ֛ת <WH1191> And Baalath וְאֶת־ <WH853> [תָּמָר כ] (תַּדְמֹ֥ר <WH8412> continually ק) בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> in the wilderness בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land

וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֵ֤י <WH5892> And all the cities הַֽמִּסְכְּנוֹת֙ <WH4543> of store אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which הָי֣וּ <WH1961> had לִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <WH8010> that Solomon וְאֵת֙ <WH853> עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> had and cities הָרֶ֔כֶב <WH7393> for his chariots וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> and cities הַפָּרָשִׁ֑ים <WH6571> for his horsemen וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> חֵ֣שֶׁק <WH2837> and that שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <WH8010> which Solomon אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which חָשַׁק֙ <WH2836> desired לִבְנ֤וֹת <WH1129> to build בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> in Jerusalem וּבַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <WH3844> and in Lebanon וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> and in all the land מֶמְשַׁלְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4475> of his dominion

כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֠עָם <WH5971> [And] all the people הַנּוֹתָ֨ר <WH3498> [that were] left מִן־ <WH4480> at הָאֱמֹרִ֜י <WH567> of the Amorites הַחִתִּ֤י <WH2850> Hittites הַפְּרִזִּי֙ <WH6522> Perizzites הַחִוִּ֣י <WH2340> Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֔י <WH2983> and Jebusites אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> were not מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> which [were] not of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵֽמָּה׃ <WH1992> like

בְּנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1121> Their children אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who נֹתְר֤וּ <WH3498> that were left אַחֲרֵיהֶם֙ <WH310> after בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> them in the land אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> whom לֹֽא־ <WH3808> were not יָכְל֛וּ <WH3201> also were not able בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> whom the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לְהַֽחֲרִימָ֑ם <WH2763> utterly to destroy וַיַּעֲלֵ֤ם <WH5927> levy שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <WH8010> upon those did Solomon לְמַס־ <WH4522> a tribute עֹבֵ֔ד <WH5647> of bondservice עַ֖ד <WH5704> even הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this
